title: Capture Your Vedios
description: Captures video,  sound  and  pictures of anything you see on  your  screen.  Any  part  of the screen or a window  or  the  entire desktop can be recorded. Record  your  web  cam sessions, favorite games,any  software on your desktop, any video display on  your  screen,  record audio of what you hear from  your  speakers... Includes Movie and Photo Studios!
